DOC.brief_summary: The purpose 2 phase , open-label study compare safety efficacy etanercept conventional Disease Modifying Antirheumatic Drug ( DMARD ) therapy Latin American subject moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis 128 week . Phase 1 randomize 24 week treatment period ; Phase 2 optional open-label 104 week period allow investigator choose continuation phase I treatment addition , discontinuation titration DMARD therapy already utilized study .
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Study Comparing Etanercept Conventional Disease Modifying Antirheumatic Drug ( DMARD ) Therapy
